title: Ulster heritage
creator_credit: Ronald H. Riley, R.H.R. Productions, Film Producers Guild and Stanley Willis
brief_description: From the story of one family and one farm in Northern Ireland, a colorful and impressive picture of a modern farming community emerges, giving incidental glimpses of Ulster as a highly modern industrialised province and a place of considerable scenic attractions.
creator_credit_for_label: Ronald H. Riley, R.H.R. Productions, Film Producers Guild and Stanley Willis
